scripts.start:sandbox: export NODE_ENV=sandbox ; ./node_modules/.bin/pm2 --no-daemon --watch --ignore-watch '*.log' -a -l pm2.log -o out.log -e err.log start app.js
scripts.start:staging: export NODE_ENV=staging ; ./node_modules/.bin/pm2 -a -p pid.log -l pm2.log -o out.log -e err.log start app.js
scripts.start:production: export NODE_ENV=production ; ./node_modules/.bin/pm2 -a -p pid.log -l pm2.log -o out.log -e err.log start app.js
